subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour veteran Michael Bradley won the Puerto Rico Open by one shot after making an 11-foot putt on the 18th hole at Trump International Golf Club in Rio Grande. Bradley had a 14-under 274 on the windy 7,526-yard course. Jason Day and Brett Quigley finished second. P.R.
